About Us

Altitude Securities Law Office is a boutique law firm focused on bringing a modern, yet professional approach, to the financial industry. Our attorneys have collectively over 28 years of experience and have successfully served small businesses, financial institutions, investment advisors and registered representatives in more than 32 states and 4 countries.

We focus on working with small and mid-sized businesses in the financial industry sector – from formation through growth and expansion, including sales and acquisitions. Our partners specialize in litigation, regulatory defense, private funds, mergers and acquisitions, and general counsel services.

At Altitude, our goal is to make our client’s experience with the legal process smooth and stress free. We offer a personalized approach, by tailoring our representation to fit each client’s current needs and to build an ongoing relationship in order to meet all potential future legal needs that may arise.

excerpt.rendered: About Us Altitude Securities Law Office is a boutique law firm focused on bringing a modern, yet professional approach, to the financial industry. Our attorneys have collectively over 28 years of experience and have successfully served small businesses, financial institutions, investment advisors and registered representatives in more than 32 states and 4 countries. We focus […]
